TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1363

barker_notes.barker_summary: Samuel Norris to---------, June 27, 1826. Asking assistance for mail rider.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1363

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Samuel Norris to---------, June 27, 1826. Asking assistance for mail rider.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-27-1826">June 27th 1826*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*to all that this may be pres[e]nted are hereby commande[d] to give any assistance to the *person_mentioned*mail rider*/person_mentioned* to forward him on either in horses or provision at his expences*/p*
*p*all ferry are also commanded [to] cross him without fail or any delay*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Samuel Norris */person_mentioned*[Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
